committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Education, Arts, and Humanities

official_title: A bill to encourage the education and other activities of the Richard B. Russell Foundation.

summary.text: Richard B. Russell Foundation Act - Authorizes the Secretary of Education to make matching grants to assist in the development of the Richard B. Russell Foundation, located at the University of Georgia, Athens, Georgia, as a center for congressional archives and scholarship. Authorizes appropriations for fiscal years 1981 through 1987 to carry out this Act.

titles.title: A bill to encourage the education and other activities of the Richard B. Russell Foundation.
